comment: Most annoying teacher to take honestly, for discussions you have to post yours wait 24 hours to respond to one classmate than 24 hours to respond to another, every assignment is just writing papers about some obscure topic around it policy, midterm was easy but the discussion thing and writing a two page paper every week was pretty annoying
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read--So many papers

comment: She clearly cares about the students that she teaches. She provided clear feedback on assignments and encouraged the class to get their assignments done early.
